patthana15.87:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.87:0.3_0: this is the nature of the past.
patthana15.87:1.1_0: Purified by conflict and refuge, it doesn’t belong to the teaching.
patthana15.87:1.1_1: Passination on the four supports, the three supports.
patthana15.87:1.1_2: (This is the sound of the past.)
